BEFORE:
x1 = self.conv0(x)
        x2 = self.w0(x)
        x = x1 + x2
        x = F.gelu(x)

        x1 = self.conv1(x)
        x2 = self.w1(x)
        x = x1 + x2
        x = F.gelu(x)

        x1 = self.conv2(x)
        x2 = self.w2(x)
        x = x1 + x2
        x = F.gelu(x)

        x1 = self.conv3(x)
        x2 = self.w3(x)
        x = x1 + x2
AFTER:
for i in range(self.n_layers):
            x1 = self.conv0(x)
            x2 = self.w0(x)
            x = x1 + x2
            if i < self.n_layers - 1:
                x = F.gelu(x)

        x = x[..., :-self.padding, :-self.padding, :-self.padding]
